text: Mainly fine. Haze during the day. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Mainly fine. Haze during the day. Light winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Light winds, becoming force 3 to 4 easterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, becoming force 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Cold and dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 4 to 5 northerly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
Cold and dry. Mainly fine. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Cold and dry. Fine. Force 2 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
